MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the WA7 postcode area of Runcorn affecting properties in Walsingham Drive and Sheridan Way.  In order to complete repairs on the underground cable network, engineers on site need to isolate the power at 11:00am and we expect the power to be restored by 3:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:20am on 21st April 2021.
